department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Project Description: Upgrading  of roof replacement and repair of CCG base in Stephenvillecaffold
description: Project Description: PSPC on behalf of DFO has a requirement to design the replacement of the roof and canopy materials, HVAC system and perimeter caulking at the Canadian Coast Guard Base in Stephenville, NL.  Invited Firms: This is a request for proposals (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA) E0225-152290 for Architecture and Interior Design Services. The invited firms qualified under the A2 discipline for the province of Newfoundland and Labrador are: Turner Fleischer Architects Inc., Root architecture inc., Lydon Lynch Architects Ltd., Architecture49 Inc., Duffus Romans Kundzins Rounsefell Ltd., Gibbons Snow Architects Inc., and Stantec Architecture Ltd.  Debrief: Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.  The RFP issuing office is: Atlantic Region Acquisitions, 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, N.S. B3J 1T3. This office provides services in English. Proposals may be formatted to be submitted in either official language of Canada. Reference the solicitation for further details.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Roof Replacement Design - Stephenville CCG Base

### Tender Details
- **Tender Reference Code**: WS4485123528-Doc4485126168
- **Public Date**: 20 March 2024
- **Closing Date**: 9 April 2024, 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 19 April 2024

### Brief Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites interested firms to submit their proposals for the design replacement of the roof and canopy materials, HVAC system, and perimeter caulking at the Canadian Coast Guard Base in Stephenville, Newfoundland and Labrador.

### RFP Details
- **RFP Solicitation Number**: WS4485123528
- **RFP Title**: Roof Replacement Design - Stephenville CCG Base
- **Supply Arrangement**: E0225-152290 for Architecture and Interior Design Services
- **Eligible Firms**: Firms qualified under the A2 discipline for the province of Newfoundland and Labrador
- **Invited Firms**: Turner Fleischer Architects Inc., Root architecture inc., Lydon Lynch Architects Ltd., Architecture49 Inc., Duffus Romans Kundzins Rounsefell Ltd., Gibbons Snow Architects Inc., and Stantec Architecture Ltd.

### Submission Requirements
- **Proposal Submission**: Proposals may be submitted in either English or French.
- **Electronic Submission**: Not applicable
- **Administrative Inquiries**: Please contact Rachel Miller at (rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, N.S. B3J 1T3.

### Contracting Authority
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Trade Agreements
This tender is governed by the trade agreements listed below:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade
